problem.p: A thin rod of uniform mass M and length d is placed on a horizontal and frictionless table. The rod is free two rotate about a pivot at one end. A small bug of mass m, initially standing at a distance x from the pivot decides to jumps off with a speed v relative to the surface as shown in the figure.

a) Briefly explain if the following statements are true or false during the time interval of the jump:
1) Linear momentum of the rod+insect system is constant.
2) Angular momentum of the rod+insect system is constant about the center of mass of the combined system.
3) Angular momentum of the rod+insect system is constant about the pivot point.
Calculate the magnitude of the angular velocity of the rod at the instant right after the insect has jumped off the rod.
